name: The Fool
description: You may only use your non-dominant hand as long as you hold this card.
flavor: Don't you dare to spill your drink on this game!

name: Grandpa
description: You may not show your teeth while holding this card.

name: Caveman
description: As long as you hold this card, you can only say three words at a time.

name: Twitter
description: While holding this card you must start every sentence with 'hashtag'.

name: Knifes Edge
description:
Ask everyone to come up with any rule for this status card. Don't read the rest of this card out loud until they have.
Done? The card applies to the player who came up with the rule!

name: Knifes Edge
description:
Ask everyone to come up with any rule for this status card. Don't read the rest of this card out loud until they have.
Done? The effect that was chosen for this status card applies to you!

name: Wear it Backwards
description: While holding this card, wear an article of clothing backwards.

name: Sheriff
description: While you hold this card, other players may try to cheat when being forced to drink. If you notice, they drink double. If you don't, you drink what they left out.

name: Lawyer
description: Make up a rule. It is active as long as this card is in play.

name: Merge
description: Merge with the player to your right, causing you to function as a single player. You share all statuses and actions always targeted both of you. On your turn, cast dice once and move both figures.
flavor: Who of us is the evil twin?

name: The Plague
description: Whoever holds the plague drinks double. Moves to the left after each round.

name: Amnesia
description: You cannot say any players name, including your own. If you do, drink:beer:.
flavor: Shit, where did I leave my keys?

name: The Floor is Lava
description: You cannot touch the floor. If you do, drink:beer:
flavor: Just like when you were little

name: CAPSLOCK
description: While holding this card, you can only yell.

name: Curse Jar
description: Choose a player. Whenever that player curses, you get a material:material:.

name: Cursed Scarab
description: Whenever you gain materials, you gain an additional material:material: but you also have to drink:beer:.
flavor: Isn't that a shiny little thing

name: The Good Fairy
description: You fetch everyones drinks while holding this card. For each drink you fetch for someone else, you gain one material:material:.

name: Ghost
description: All other players ignore you for anything not directly related to the game as long as this card is active.

name: Head Protection
description: Use something as a makeshift helmet. Keep it on your head as long as this card is active.

name: Old Sailor
description: You have to curse everytime you talk

name: Beer Goggles
description: Make someone a compliment whenever your turn starts.
flavor: You are smarter than you look

name: Trust
description: You roll dice blind. The other players tell you what you've rolled.

name: Lady
description: You always drink with your pinky extended

name: Ring Ring
description: Turn up the volume on your phone. Whenever it rings, drink:beer:.

name: Question Master
description: Whenever another player answers a question you have asked, that player must drink:beer:.
flavor: With great power comes great responsibility

name: Wrong Way
description: While this card is active, you can only move backwards on the board and in real life.

name: Two Face
description: While this card is active, you and your right neighbor swap names.

name: Mute
description: Choose a word. While this card is active, anyone who says that word must drink.

name: Hostage
description: Take off a piece of clothing. You may only put it back on when this card is no longer active for you.

name: Creep
description: Whenever you talk to someone of the opposite sex, act like you just hinted at something dirty by winking etc. Also, just generally act like a creep.

name: Chin Up Champ
description: As long as this card is active, you must keep your chin on the table at all times.

name: Soul Link
description: All players with a Soul Link card active share all their status cards with each other.

name: Soul Link
description: All players with a Soul Link card active share all their status cards with each other.

name: Soul Link
description: All players with a Soul Link card active share all their status cards with each other.

name: Psychologist
description: You may only refer to yourself in the third person.
flavor: If he doesn't follow the rules, he drinks

name: Bad Batch
description: That last batch made you blind. Keep your eyes closed. This card is removed when you pass the Frat House.

name: Praying Mantis
description: While this card is active, your ellbows have to constantly touch each other.

name: Power Play
description: As long as this card is active, the first person of the opposite sex to the left of you becomes your mistress/master. Address them by their own chosen title and ask them for permission whenever you want to do something.
flavor: May I roll the dice, mistress?

name: Bee's Knees
description: While this card is active, touch the knee of the person to your right.

name: Eskimo
description: Put on an article of clothing from everyone else who is playing. Wear them as long as this card is active.

name: Freeze
description: Do not move, unless it is required of you by the game.

name: 1st Day of School
description: While this card is active, you must raise your hand before speaking.

name: PC Principal
description: Whenever someone says something that is even remotely politically incorrect, call them out on it. They drink:beer:.

name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: Play Rock Paper Scissors once against everyone. Steal a material:material: from each player you win against. Drink:beer: for each loss.

name: Redshirt
description: The person with the reddest shirt finishes their drink.
flavor: No officers or engineers were harmed in the making of this game.

name: Feminism, bitch!
description: Name 5 famous women from history. Drink:beer: once for each you fall short. Got all 5? Have 3 materials:material:.

name: Go Home...
description: ... You're Drunk. Move to the Frat House.
flavor: Home is where the beer is

name: Lick Someone
description: You know, lick someone.

name: Lovahs
description: Everyone in a relationship drinks:beer:.

name: Lone Wolf
description: Everyone who is single drinks:beer:.
flavor: I'm single because I want to be

name: Get Inked
description: Get someone to draw on you. Who, Where and What: You get to choose two, they choose the other.
flavor: Trust me, you don't want to leave out 'Where'.

name: Pickup
description: Use a pickup line on someone.
flavor: Are you my little toe? Because I want to bang you on the sofa

name: Four Eyes
description: Drink:beer: if you wear glasses.

name: Something Cute?
description: Guess the color of everyones underwear. For each wrong guess,you drink:beer: once. For every correct guess, they drink:beer: twice.
flavor: I SEE LONDON, I SEE FRANCE

name: Thousand-Yard Stare
description: Enter a staring contest with the player to the left. Whoever wins gets three materials:material:. The loser drinks:beer: three.

name: The Meltingpot
description: Take a drink from everyones cup. You get a material:material: for every drink you finish.

name: Chicken
description: You may draw another event card. If you do, everything on that card is doubled.

name: Mathmagician
description: You may remove any number of articles of clothings. You recieve materials:material: equal to the number of removed clothes squared. Socks only count once.
flavor: I can make your clothes disappear

name: Bros before Hos
description: All female players drink:beer:.

name: Chicks before Dicks
description: All male players drink:beer:.

name: Resurrection
description: Play any event card from the discard pile.

name: Tradecraft
description: Swap a status card with another player. If you can't, drink:beer: and draw again!
flavor: That one looks way nicer than mine

name: Your Lucky Day
description: Draw an action card, gain its cost in materials:material: and roll the dice again!
flavor: Well, that went better than expected

name: Charity
description: Give a material:material: to each player. Everyone who receives one, drinks:beer:.

name: Challenge Accepted
description: The other players agree on a challenge and reward in materials:material:. If you fulfill the challenge, you receive the materials as a reward.

name: ANGRY TRAIN
description: Make an angry train sound. Have a material:material: for your troubles.

name: Beernado
description: Spin as fast as you can for 10 seconds. Gain a material:material: for every two spins.
flavor: You spin me right round baby right round, like a record baby

name: Dirty Mind
description: If you've ever fantasized about someone who is playing, drink a shot:shot:. If you tell us who it is, you can make it a drink:beer: instead. Significant others don't count!

name: Profit
description: Get a material:material: from each player. For each recieved material, drink:beer: once.
flavor: I steal from the poor and give to myself

name: Bravery
description: Drink as many shots:shot: as you like. For each one, gain three materials:material:
flavor: They may take our lives, but they'll never take... OUR FREEDOM

name: Witch Hunt
description: Remove all active status cards from a player of your choice. Drink:beer: for each removed card.
flavor: Bloody Mary, Bloody Mary, Bloody Mary

name: Treasure Chest
description: The Chest contains loot! Roll a die and receive the result in materials:material:.
flavor: I expected it to be booby-trapped

name: Truth Serum
description: Answer a question asked by the group truthfully.

name: Story Time
description: Tell a drinking story that involves another player. You and that player touch glasses and drink:beer:.
flavor: And they lived happily ever after

name: How Impolite
description: Anyone with their phone visible must drink:beer:. If they are holding it in their hands, they drink a shot:shot: instead
flavor: Can't we just have a conversation for once

name: Reset
description: Shuffle all active status cards back into their decks.

name: Helping Hand
description: All players agree on who is most drunk. You drink that players share until the end of their next turn.

name: Selfiieeee
description: Take a selfie together with an object of the groups choosing. Send it to the 11th person of the opposite sex in your contacts from top or bottom. Your choice.

name: Nickname
description: Give someone a nickname. Anyone who fails to call that person by their new name drinks:beer:.

name: Weapons Trade
description: Trade an action card with another player of your choice. Both of you choose their own card to trade away. Whoever receives the card with the higher cost drinks:beer: the costs difference.

name: Treasure Map
description: Move forward three squares and look for treasure. You find 4 materials:material:.

name: Spin the Bottle
description: Play a round of Truth or Dare.
flavor: I dare you, I double dare you motherfucker

name: Pablo Picasso
description: Paint a picture of someone! Sell it to someone for materials:material:.
flavor: Draw me like one of your french girls

name: Makeover
description: Swap an article of clothing with someone else.

name: Pantomime
description: You have to pantomime a word whispered to you by the person to your right. You, and whoever guesses it, gains five materials:material:.

name: Denunciation
description: Everyone points at another player. Whoever has the most persons pointing at him, drinks:beer: twice.

name: Out of Juice
description: The player with the least amount in their drink finishes their drink.

name: Concoction
description: Mix a cocktail from whatever you want. Everyone (including yourself) drinks from it until it is gone.
flavor: Zombie ain't got nothing on this

name: One Cup
description: Choose two players who have to simultaneously drink from the same cup.

name: Grenade
description: Throw this card at someone. If it hits someone, they have to drink:beer:. If it misses, you drink:beer:.

name: System Overload
description: Drink:beer: once for each of your active status cards, then remove one of them.
flavor: Have you tried turning it off and on again?

name: Ouroboros
description: Replay the last event card.

name: Russian Roulette
description: Spin a bottle. Whoever it points to drinks a shot:shot:.

name: Beer Police
description: The person that is least drunk, as voted by the group, drinks:beer:.
flavor: Son do you know what I'm stopping you for?

name: Stay in Contact
description: The person to your left types a message to any of your contacts on your phone, but doesn't send it. Read the message out loud, and either send it or drink a shot:shot:.

name: Rich Bitch
description: The person with the most money drinks:beer:.

name: Paranoia
description: Whisper a question to the player to your left, which can be answered with the name of a player. The named player may drink a shot:shot: to reveal the question.
flavor: Which player is dressed the sluttiest?

name: Motorboat
description: Guess the cup size of the first girl to your left. If you are correct, they drink:beer:. If you are wrong, you drink:beer:.

name: Human Horn
description: The group decides which guy probably has the biggest dick. That guy drinks:beer:.

name: The Well
description: Drink:beer: as much as you like. Choose another player who has to match what you just drank.

name: Armwrestle
description: Arm wrestle the player opposite of you. The winner gets three materials:material:. The loser drinks:beer:.

name: Patriotism
description: Drink:beer: and gargle the national anthem.

name: Sexism
description: Make a sexist remark about the opposite sex. Everyone of the opposite sex drinks.

name: Men in Blank
description: For every weapon you have, either drink a shot:shot: or take off a piece of clothing.

name: Alien Attack
description: The aliens are going for another attack! Everyone drink.

name: The Slap
description: Choose a player who slaps your ass. And don't forget to thank them afterwards!

name: Gecko
description: Everyone has to put up three limbs on a wall as quickly as possible. Last person drinks:beer:

name: Trefoil Leaf
description: Tell three things about yourself, one of which is made up. If the group guesses which one is fake, you drink:beer:. If they are wrong, you get five materials:material:.

name: Earthquake
description: Everyone hide under the table! The last one drinks:beer:.

name: Lifeline
description: Stick this card on your lips. Pass it around a full round by sucking and blowing. If someone drops the card, they drink:beer:.
flavor: How often has this game been played already?

name: Visit from Grandma
description: Everyone pinches your cheeks and gives you one material:material:.
flavor: Don't spend it all at once

name: Slutty
description: Drink:beer: once for every sexual partner you've had.

name: Thumb Wrestle
description: Thumb-wrestle everyone. Whenever you lose, you drink:beer:. If you win, you gain a material:material:

name: Sound Check
description: Name the currently playing song. If you can, you get three materials:material:. If you can't, drink:beer:

name: Laying Pipe
description: Going clockwise, everyone has to name a different euphemism for sex. The first person who can't drinks a shot:shot:

name: Dendrophilia
description: Sensually whisper the name of a tree into the ear of the first person of the opposite sex to your right. If anyone is aroused by this, drink:beer: you freak!
flavor: Damn you's a sexy birch, a sexy birch

name: Creeper
description: Close your eyes, think of doing it with someone who is playing and put on your creepiest smile. Then have a drink:beer:.

name: Poet
description: Choose a word. Going in clockwise direction, everyone has to say a word that rimes with it. The first one who can't, drinks:beer:.

name: Swift Tailor
description: Take off and create a line out of as many articles of clothing as you like. For each meter, you gain two material:material:.

name: Your Style
description: Give an article of clothing to a player of your choice, who has to wear it.

name: Tasty
description: Swap beverages with the person to your left.

name: Songwriter
description: Choose a song. Going in circle, everyone recites the next line from it's lyrics. The first one who can't continue, drinks. The person who finishes the song, gets five materials:material:. You start.
flavor: Is this real life, is this just fanttasy

name: Eye Contact
description: Everyone look at the ground. On the count of three, everyone has to look at another players eyes. Any players who make eye contact, drink.

name: Storyteller
description: Write a message containing two words chosen by the group to 21st contact in your phone, or drink a shot:shot:.

name: Picture Day
description: Point a camera somewhere and slowly count to three, then take a picture. Whoever is not in it, drinks!
